MS.S: Module with DSC Resources for Remote Desktop Session Host

## [2.0.0] - 2020-09-29_x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Updated filename for CHANGELOG.MD to CHANGELOG.md_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 2.0.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- xRemoteDesktopSessionHost_x000D__x000A_ - Added automatic release with a new CI pipeline._x000D__x000A_ - Added DSC HQRM Tests_x000D__x000A_- xRDCertificateConfiguration_x000D__x000A_ - New resource to configure the used certificate on a deployment_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Changes to xRDSessionCollectionConfiguration_x000D__x000A_ - Fixing comparison of some RD Session Collection Configuration properties and_x000D__x000A_ supplied parameters by moving to the DscResource.Common `Test-DscParameterState` cmdlet._x000D__x000A_ ([issue #82](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xRemoteDesktopSessionHost/issues/82))._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xRDSessionDeployment_x000D__x000A_ - Fixing Get-TargetResource to target the connection broker, instead of_x000D__x000A_ assuming localhost_x000D__x000A_- Changes to xRDServer_x000D__x000A_ - Changed resouce key from Server alone to Role + Server._x000D__x000A_ This allows the resource to be used multiple times for different roles on_x000D__x000A_ the same server. (Issue #62)_x000D__x000A_- Changes to xRemoteApp_x000D__x000A_ - Fix xRDRemoteApp Test-TargetResource to not test PowerShell common parameters_x000D__x000A_- Changes to tests_x000D__x000A_ - Pin tests to use Pester v4 instead of latest (v5)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.9.0.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Changes to xRDRemoteApp_x000D__x000A_ - Fixing typo in parameter name when calling the function ValidateCustomModeParameters (issue #50)._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xRDSessionDeployment_x000D__x000A_ - When RDMS service does not exist the Get-TargetResource will no longer throw an error (issue #47)._x000D__x000A_- Rename Tests/Unit folder to use upper case on first letter._x000D__x000A_- Update appveyor.yml to use the default template._x000D__x000A_- Added default template files .codecov.yml, .gitattributes, and .gitignore, and_x000D__x000A_ .vscode folder._x000D__x000A_- xRDSessionCollectionConfiguration:_x000D__x000A_ - Changed CollectionName variable validation max length to 256_x000D__x000A_- xRDSessionCollection_x000D__x000A_ - Changed CollectionName variable validation max length to 256_x000D__x000A_- xRDRemoteApp_x000D__x000A_ - Changed CollectionName variable validation max length to 256_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.8.0.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Changes to xRDSessionDeployment_x000D__x000A_ - Fixed issue where an initial deployment failed due to a convert to lowercase (issue #39)._x000D__x000A_ - Added unit tests to test Get, Test and Set results in this resource._x000D__x000A_- Change to xRDRemoteApp_x000D__x000A_ - Fixed issue where this resource ignored the CollectionName provided in the parameters (issue #41)._x000D__x000A_ - Changed key values in schema.mof to only Alias and CollectionName, DisplayName and FilePath are not key values._x000D__x000A_ - Added Ensure property (Absent or Present) to enable removal of RemoteApps._x000D__x000A_ - Added unit tests to test Get, Test and Set results in this resource._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.7.0.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Added additional resources, copied from the [Azure RDS quickstart templates](https://github.com/Azure/RDS-Templates)._x000D__x000A_- xRDSessionCollection:_x000D__x000A_ - Fixed call to Add-RDSessionHost in Set-TargetResource by properly removing CollectionDescription from PSBoundParameters (issue #28)_x000D__x000A_ - Fixed bug on Get-TargetResource that did return any collection instead of the one collection the user asked for (issue #27)_x000D__x000A_ - Added unit tests to test Get, Test and Set results in this resource_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.6.0.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- xRDSessionCollectionConfiguration: Add support to configure UserProfileDisks on Windows Server 2016_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.5.0.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fix issue where DSC configuration gets into a reboot loop because sessionhost does not match (casing) and RDMS service is not started in time_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.4.0.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Updated CollectionName parameter to validate length between 1 and 15 characters, and added tests to verify._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.3.0.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Converted appveyor.yml to install Pester from PSGallery instead of from Chocolatey._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.2.0.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fixed an issue with version checks where OS version greater than 9 would fail (Windows 10/Server 2016)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.1.0.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fixed encoding_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.0.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Initial release with the following resources_x000D__x000A_ - xRDSessionDeployment_x000D__x000A_ - xRDSessionCollection_x000D__x000A_ - xRDSessionCollectionConfiguration_x000D__x000A_ - xRDRemoteApp
